question: 大阪弁
sourceMnemonic: Remember <ja>大阪</ja> (Osaka)? This is the <kanji>dialect</kanji> they speak, making this word <vocabulary>Osaka dialect</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: If you know how to read <ja>大阪</ja> you can just add <ja>弁</ja> to it and be able to read the whole thing, though maybe not in <vocabulary>Osaka dialect</vocabulary>. Okay, fine, it's probably the same thing in Osaka dialect.
